code: import axios from"axios";const apiKey="2AeCG5EvH9bqHPhs9XYJbc4kd06GEeSq";const apiClient=axios.create({baseURL:"https://api.nytimes.com/svc/search/v2/",timeout:5000});export const fetchArticlesAPI=query=>apiClient.get("articlesearch.json",{params:{q:query,"api-key":apiKey}});export const fetchArticleByIdAPI=id=>apiClient.get("articlesearch.json",{params:{fq:"_id:\"".concat(id,"\""),"api-key":apiKey}});export default apiClient;
